name: Rusty Ride
description:
Embark on an exhilarating adventure as a rugged veteran in the driver's seat of a battle-worn vehicle that's seen better days, yet harbors a heart of steel. This isn't just any decrepit car — it's a roaring beast equipped with a formidable tank cannon and a high-powered jetpack, ready to defy both age and gravity.
Journey through a procedurally generated world that unfurls new challenges and vistas with each play through.
Unleash chaos as you obliterate obstacles in your path, transforming your once humble vehicle into a powerhouse of destruction with a plethora of upgrades awaiting to be discovered. Flex your strategic muscles as you decide whether to obliterate your enemies in a rain of cannon fire or soar to new heights to reach previously inaccessible areas.

Since Unity is now fucked up, I decided to semi cancel this game.
Now it will be completely free, so they don't make any money from it.
But now the game will be only 1 level long. I might continue the project and 100% complete it if I don't have anything better to do with my life, but now I'll probably start a new game on UE5 or Godot
